Fireball.description: Standard pyromancy of the Great Swamp. Hurl fireball.
acquisition: Laurentius, Quelana and starting spell for the Pyromancer class.

Fire Orb.description: Pyromancy which improves upon Fireball. Hurl fire orb.

Great Fireball.description: Ultimate fireball pyromancy. Hurl giant fireball.

Great Chaos Fireball.description: Hurl giant chaos fireball, leaving a large amount of temporary lava
acquisition: Joining Chaos Servant covenant (Daughter of Chaos after Quelaag)

Firestorm.description: Primal pyromancy taught by Quelana of Izalith. Erect fire pillars in vicinity. Note: Uses 17 uses per cast.

Fire Tempest.description: Primal pyromancy of Quelana of Izalith. Erect giant fire pillars in vicinity.
acquisition: Quelana  gives it to you after finishing her favor.

Chaos Storm.description: Erect localized chaos fire pillars which leave blobs of temporary lava Note: Like firestorm and leaves a little lava behind.
acquisition: Rank 2 in Chaos Servant (30 humanities total)

Combustion.description: Elementary pyromancy. Create powerful flame in hand Note: Good 'melee' range spell, very quick too.

Great Combustion.description: Pyromancy which improves upon Combustion. Create powerful, giant flame in hand. Note: Very good melee range spell.

Fire Surge.description: Pyromancy foreign to the Great Swamp. Create a surge of flame from palm of hand. Note: Rapid fire spell you can cast while moving.
acquisition: Drop from the Bloated Dredge located after passing two illusory walls under the well, in Painted World of Ariamis.

Fire Whip.description: Primal pyromancy taught by Quelana of Izalith. Sweep foes with fire whip. Note: Uses 21 uses per cast. Note:Hits twice/cast

Chaos Fire Whip.description: Sweep foes with chaos fire whip with lava traces Note: Leaves lava behind for a bit. Follows same mechanics as Fire Whip.
acquisition: Chest in Lost Izalith - turn right at the boss fog, it is down the path and around the corner guarded by a Chaos Eater.

Poison Mist.description: Breathes out a cone of poison mist that fills the surrounding area causing poison status.
acquisition: Swamp in Blighttown, Eingyi, the Egg-burdened NPC near the Daughter of Chaos sells this. (You need to be an Egg-head to be able to purchase this.)

Toxic Mist.description: Breathes out a cone of toxic mist that fills the surrounding area causing toxic status.
acquisition: Eingyi, the Egg Burdened NPC near the Daughter of Chaos. (You need to be an Egg-head to be able to purchase this.)

Acid Surge.description: Pyromancy foreign to the Great Swamp. Emit acid which corrodes weapons and armor damaging their durability. Does not affect user.
acquisition: In the graveyard area to the right side as you enter near the edge of the cliff in the Painted World of Ariamis.

Flash Sweat.description: Covers the player in water, reduces fire damage.

Iron Flesh.description: Self-buff, raises defenses and poise. Note: User becomes heavy and unable to move freely: can only walk, can't run, sprint, roll, or jump.

Power Within.description: Increases Attack and Defense but gradually drains HP

Undead Rapport.description: Advanced pyromancy of Quelana of Izalith. Charm undead and gain temporary allies. Melee ranged support spell with about 2 second cast time.

Black Flame.description: Similar to Great Combustion. Melee-range pyromancy. Main difference with Great Combustion is that when Black Flame is blocked, it consumes a much higher amount of stamina than Great Combustion, making this pyromancy great for breaking guards.
acquisition: Found on a corpse in the Chasm of the Abyss.
